content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.D_STMDVehicle') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.D_STMDVehicle
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.D_STMDVehicle (

    [md_vehicle_id] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_uid] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicletype] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_internalexternal] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_activeflag] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_vehiclestatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_chassisnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_depot] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_enginenumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_fleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_fueltype] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_registrationnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleapplication] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclebodymake] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclecolour] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclemake] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclemodel] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleseries] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_year] int,
    [md_vehicle_vehicleownerid] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_vehicleowner] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_staffvehicleflag] int,
    [md_vehicle_vehicletrailersize] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicletrailertype] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleetollclass] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_brn] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_brnnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleregisterno] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclebasicinsdate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_insby] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_islinehaulvehicle] int,
    [md_vehicle_internalheight] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_internallength] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_internalvolume] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_internalwidth] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclebasicmoddate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_trailerflag] int,
    [md_vehicle_workflowstatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleapproveddate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_mmcode] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_tmplicenseexpiery] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_currentadvertising] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_fuelcardnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_fuelcardreceivedate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_licenseexpirydate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_licensefee] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleadvertisingindicator] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclespeedgoverningdevice] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_oldregistrationnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_oldchassisnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_oldenginenumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_logbookrecord] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_adminstatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicleadmincompletebydate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_backdoorheight] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_backdoorwidth] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_externalheight] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_externallength] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_externalwidth] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_fleximounts] int,
    [md_vehicle_fuelcapacity] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_grossvehiclemass] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_numberoftyres] int,
    [md_vehicle_numberoftyresrear] int,
    [md_vehicle_numberoftyressteering] int,
    [md_vehicle_payload] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_peoplecarrier] int,
    [md_vehicle_tareweight] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_tyresize] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_tyresizealternative] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_targetfuelconsumption] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_tankrange] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_operationsstatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclevehicleoperationscompletebydate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_assetnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_contractenddate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_contractnumber] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_contractstartdate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclefinancecompany] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_budgetrmcpk] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_budgettyrecpk] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_retailvalue] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_tradeinvalue] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_loadbodyreplacementcost] numeric(18,2),
    [md_vehicle_financestatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehiclefinancecompletebydate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_trackingstatus] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicletrackingcompletebydate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_vehicletrackingmoddate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_assetid] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_providerid] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_providername] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_serial] nvarchar(4000),
    [md_vehicle_vehicletrackinginsdate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_linkdate] datetime2(7),
    [md_vehicle_linkby] bigint,
    [md_vehicle_linkbyname] nvarchar(4000),

    
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/MD/stmdvehicle.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.D_STMDVehicle 
GO
